desc: "The Lost Homecoming - When Our Vietnam Veterans Came " aired recently on a PBS Station. It tells the sad story of how badly many Vietnam Veterans were treated coming home. During the career of the Writer/Co-Director/ Producer he evaluated and treated a number of Vietnam veterans who shared their bitterness and anger over how badly they were treated coming from Vietnam. New Research is now showing a significant correlation between a negative homecoming and severity of PTSD among a substantial minority of Vietnam veterans. This documentary interviewed a number of Vietnam veterans as it  describes the importance of honoring our Vietnam veterans. What is needed now is fundraising to cover production costs.
